original_title: The Looney, Looney, Looney Bugs Bunny Movie
overview: Bugs Bunny hosts an award show featuring several classic Looney Tunes shorts and characters.
tagline: Academy Award Winner Friz Freleng's Greatest Warner Bros. Comedy Classics Plus All New Cartoons For the Big Screen.
title: The Looney, Looney, Looney Bugs Bunny Movie
